title: Tommaso：退出世界時水不會卡住了
author: edwinyoo44
txt_content:
Tommaso Checchi：

After 3 memory leaks fixed, 100 files changed and one system refactored, water doesn't get stuck anymore if you exit your world, yay!

Tommaso Checchi：

三個記憶體BUG確定後，在一個系統中重建了100個檔案，耶~~現在當你退出世界時，水不會卡住了~

replies.author: edwinyoo44
